meanings.definition: A material that can conduct electricity without resistance when cooled to a certain temperature.
meanings.sent1: Superconductors are used in MRI machines to create strong magnetic fields.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are researching ways to increase the efficiency of superconductors.
meanings.sent3: The superconductors at the lab decided to throw a party to celebrate their conductivity.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a superconductor of ideas, flowing effortlessly and without resistance.
meanings.sent5: The superconductors hummed with energy, lighting up the room with their power.

meanings.sent1: The lab received a new shipment of superconductors for their experiments.
meanings.sent2: Superconductors have unique properties that make them valuable in technology.
meanings.sent3: The superconductors in the fridge were so cold, they shivered with excitement.
meanings.sent4: His words were like superconductors, smoothly conveying his message without hindrance.
meanings.sent5: The superconductors gleamed in the light, showcasing their extraordinary abilities.
